%1$s is not allowed in cross-platform multiplayer worlds.
Turn off multiplayer and apply pack
hbui.CreateNewWorld.general.optOutOfBeta: You'll have to start again if you go back to the old design. Are you sure you want to continue?
Go back to old design without saving
hbui.MobileDataBlockedModalRoute.title: Mobile Data Blocked
hbui.MobileDataBlockedModalRoute.onlyWif: Your current settings only allow online play over Wi-Fi. Do you want to use mobile data anyway?
hbui.MobileDataBlockedModalRoute.costWar: Using mobile data might incur additional data costs.
hbui.AchievementDisabledModal.title: You can't earn Achievements
hbui.AchievementDisabledModal.oneSetting: You will not be able to earn Achievements in this world with your current settings. If you would like to earn Achievements, change this setting before creating your world:
hbui.AchievementDisabledModal.multipleSe: You will not be able to earn Achievements in this world with your current settings. If you would like to earn Achievements, change these settings before creating your world:
hbui.AchievementDisabledModal.achievemen: Set Player Permissions to Visitor or Member
hbui.CreateNewWorld.comingSoonModal.mess: The feature is under construction. Look forward to seeing this when it's complete
hbui.RenderDistanceWarningRoute.title: Performance optimisation
hbui.RenderDistanceWarningRoute.body1: You can get better performance with render distance settings that are optimised for your device.
hbui.RenderDistanceWarningRoute.body2: Using these recommended settings will ensure a smoother gameplay experience by decreasing how far you can see in game.
hbui.SeedTemplatesRoute.title: Seed templates
hbui.SeedTemplatesRoute.errorMessageTitl: Seed templates were unable to load!
hbui.SeedTemplatesRoute.errorMessageBody: We encountered an unknown error, please try again.
hbui.CreateNewWorld.title: Create new world
hbui.CreateNewWorld.general.gameModeAdve: The template creator has defined how you can interact with the game.
hbui.CreateNewWorld.general.gameModeSurv: Explore a mysterious world where you build, collect, craft and fight monsters.
hbui.CreateNewWorld.general.gameModeCrea: Create, build and explore without limits. You can fly, have endless materials and can't be hurt by monsters.
hbui.CreateNewWorld.general.difficultyPe: No hostile mobs and only some neutral mobs spawn. Hunger bar doesn't deplete and health replenishes over time.
hbui.CreateNewWorld.general.difficultyEa: Hostile mobs spawn but deal less damage. Hunger bar depletes and drains health down to 5 hearts.
hbui.CreateNewWorld.general.difficultyNo: Hostile mobs spawn and deal standard damage. Hunger bar depletes and drains health down to half a heart.
hbui.CreateNewWorld.general.difficultyHa: Hostile mobs spawn and deal more damage. Hunger bar depletes and drains all health.
hbui.CreateNewWorld.general.internalBeta: We would love to hear what you think of this new design. Keep in mind that it's still work in progress and some functionality might be missing.
hbui.CreateNewWorld.cheats.title: Cheats
hbui.CreateNewWorld.cheats.description: Customise the game with cheat settings
hbui.CreateNewWorld.cheats.commandsDescr: Use commands in chat to activate certain features
hbui.CreateNewWorld.cheats.inventoryDesc: Keep all items in the inventory when you die
hbui.CreateNewWorld.cheats.daylightCycle: In-game time passes normally, from day to night
In-game time is locked to noon
hbui.CreateNewWorld.cheats.mobGriefingDe: Certain mobs are able to interact with your world
hbui.CreateNewWorld.cheats.entitiesDropL: Mobs and some other entities drop items when killed
hbui.CreateNewWorld.cheats.educationDesc: Optimised for desktop devices with decent RAM
hbui.CreateNewWorld.cheats.tickSpeedDesc: Affects the behaviour of certain blocks, like the speed of vegetation growth and decay (max 4096)
hbui.CreateNewWorld.advanced.title: Advanced settings
hbui.CreateNewWorld.advanced.worldSeedDe: Guides the algorithm that magically creates your world
hbui.CreateNewWorld.advanced.simulationD: The game loads and applies changes within a %1$sx%1$s block radius
Your device only allows a simulation distance of %2$s chunks. This means that the game loads and applies changes within a %1$sx%1$s block radius
hbui.CreateNewWorld.advanced.useFlatWorl: A completely flat world stretching into the distance
hbui.CreateNewWorld.advanced.startWithMa: Spawn with a blank map to explore your world
hbui.CreateNewWorld.advanced.bonusChestD: Spawn close to a chest with items to get you started
hbui.CreateNewWorld.advanced.respawnBloc: Respawn Anchors and Beds can explode
hbui.CreateNewWorld.advanced.naturalRege: Gain or lose health based on your hunger
hbui.CreateNewWorld.advanced.immediateRe: Skip the "You died!" menu and immediately respawn
hbui.CreateNewWorld.advanced.respawnRadi: Respawn within this block radius when you die and no custom spawnpoint is set (max 128)
hbui.CreateNewWorld.betaFeatures.activat: Be careful! You're activating features that are still under development. You might experience crashes, your world could break or it might not work with future updates.
hbui.CreateNewWorld.betaFeatures.gamepla: Features that change the way your world works
hbui.CreateNewWorld.betaFeatures.addOnCr: Features for add-on and Marketplace pack creators
hbui.CreateNewWorld.betaFeatures.interna: For developers only, will not show up in retail
hbui.CreateNewWorld.multiplayer.multipla: Other players can join your world
hbui.CreateNewWorld.multiplayer.playerAc: Anyone you send a direct invite can join
Anyone you've added as a Minecraft friend can join
Friends of your Minecraft friends can join
hbui.CreateNewWorld.multiplayer.nintendo: Anyone you send a direct invite to can join
Anyone you've added as a Nintendo friend can join
Friends of your Nintendo friends can join
hbui.CreateNewWorld.multiplayer.playstat: Anyone you send a direct invite to can join
Anyone you've added as a "PlayStation Network" friend can join
Friends of your "PlayStation Network" friends can join
hbui.CreateNewWorld.multiplayer.playerPe: Visitors can only observe your world, not interact with it
Members can build and mine, attack players and mobs, and interact with items and entities
Operators can teleport and use commands, in addition to everything that Members can do
hbui.CreateNewWorld.multiplayer.visibleT: Players on your local network can join your world
hbui.CreateNewWorld.resourcePacks.shared: Players need to download all active packs to join
hbui.CreateNewWorld.resourcePacks.global: The default Minecraft graphics, now updated with stylish new textures!
hbui.CreateNewWorld.resourcePacks.emptyL: Do you want to change the look of your world? Try activating a resource pack under "Available".
hbui.CreateNewWorld.resourcePacks.packPr: If multiple packs make changes to the same asset, the changes from the highest-ranked pack will be applied.
hbui.CreateNewWorld.resourcePacks.global: Global packs are active in all your worlds and can be edited in Settings.
hbui.CreateNewWorld.resourcePacks.inacti: You don't own any packs yet
Go to Marketplace or online to find packs to play your world in a different way!
hbui.CreateNewWorld.resourcePacks.userOw: You don't own any packs yet
Go to Marketplace or online to find packs to play your world in a different way!
hbui.CreateNewWorld.resourcePacks.activa: All the packs you own have already been activated. Get more packs on Marketplace or online!
hbui.CreateNewWorld.resourcePacks.getMor: Hundreds of packs available in the Marketplace
hbui.CreateNewWorld.resourcePacks.realms: You don't have a Realms Plus subscription!
Looking for your next adventure? Realms Plus gives you access to a curated collection of 100+ exciting packs, with fresh content added every month!
Go to Marketplace or online to find packs to play your world in a different way!
hbui.CreateNewWorld.behaviorPacks.emptyL: Change how items and mobs in your world behave. Get started under "Available"
hbui.CreateNewWorld.behaviorPacks.packPr: If multiple packs make changes to the same asset, the changes from the highest-ranked pack will be applied.
hbui.CreateNewWorld.behaviorPacks.inacti: You don't own any packs yet
Go to Marketplace or online to find packs to play your world in a different way!
hbui.CreateNewWorld.behaviorPacks.activa: All your owned packs have already been activated. Get more packs online!
hbui.CreateNewWorld.behaviorPacks.noPack: Behaviour Packs change the behaviour of items and mobs

hbui.Notifications.unlockSettingsMessage: Some settings are locked by the template creator.
hbui.Notifications.betaWarning.informati: Beta features are under development and might break your world. They can't be turned off after world creation.
hbui.Notifications.multiplayerWarnings.c: You are not connected to the Internet. Your friends will not be able to join your multiplayer worlds. Sign in to your Microsoft Account to play with your friends.
hbui.Notifications.multiplayerWarnings.m: You cannot play online multiplayer because of how your Microsoft Account is set up. Please ensure that your online safety settings allow Multiplayer. See instructions for changing these settings at aka.ms/MCMultiplayerHelp.

You cannot play online multiplayer because of how your Microsoft Account is set up. Please ensure your online safety settings allow Multiplayer and Clubs and you have an active Xbox Live Gold subscription. See instructions for changing these settings at aka.ms/MCMultiplayerHelp.
hbui.Notifications.multiplayerWarnings.p: You are not connected to "PlayStation Network". Your friends on "PlayStation Network" will not be able to join your multiplayer world. Sign in to "PlayStation Network" to play with friends.
Enable cross-platform play in the profile section of the settings menu to play with friends on other platforms.
You cannot play local multiplayer because of a Parental Control restriction. View and manage your multiplayer settings with 'Communicating With Others' in the Parental Controls.
hbui.Notifications.multiplayerWarnings.n: You are not connected to Nintendo Switch Online Services. Your Nintendo friends will not be able to join your multiplayer world. Sign in to Nintendo Switch Online to play with friends.
You cannot play local multiplayer because of a Parental Control restriction. View and manage your multiplayer settings with 'Communicating With Others' in the Parental Controls.
You cannot play local multiplayer because of a Parental Control restriction. View and manage your multiplayer settings with 'Communicating With Others' in the Parental Controls.
